room.assignedto: {% for user in room.assignedto.all %}{{ user.name }}{% if not forloop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}
room.notes: {% for note in room.notes.all %}{{ note.name }}{% if not forloop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}
room.procedures: {% for procedure in room.procedures.all %}{{ procedure.name }}{% if not forloop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}
